name: Robot Prog
description:
You are an engineer on earth and you have to program your robot to collect crystals on a mysterious planet.

RobotProg is a puzzle game where you give orders to your robot to get to the goal.

This game was created in 3weeks by : 

- Henno Théo : Developper, 2D Artist, Game Designer, Level Designer, UI/UX, Video maker

Twitter : https://twitter.com/NazioLt

ArtStation : https://www.artstation.com/nazio_lt

Itch.io : https://nazio-lt.itch.io/

- Picque Alexis : Developper, 3D Artist, Game Designer, Level Designer

Twitter : https://twitter.com/Xantossss

ArtStation : https://www.artstation.com/coalstudio5

Itch.io : https://xantoss.itch.io/
